statements: SELECT * FROM blacklist_accounts
SELECT account_holder, reason FROM blacklist_accounts
SELECT * FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE account_id = 1
SELECT account_holder, date_added FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE reason = 'Fraud'
SELECT account_id, reason, date_added FROM blacklist_accounts ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT * FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_holder FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE date_added >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY account_holder ASC;
SELECT reason, date_added FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE account_holder LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT account_id, reason FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE reason = 'Account Closure' AND account_holder != 'John Doe' ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM fraud_accounts WHERE blacklist_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, blacklist_reason FROM fraud_accounts WHERE account_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, blacklist_reason FROM fraud_accounts;
SELECT * FROM fraud_accounts WHERE account_id = 100;

SELECT account_id, account_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM fraud_accounts JOIN fraudulent_transactions ON fraud_accounts.account_id = fraudulent_transactions.account_id GROUP BY account_id;

SELECT account_id, account_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM fraud_accounts JOIN fraudulent_transactions ON fraud_accounts.account_id = fraudulent_transactions.account_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, blacklist_reason FROM fraud_accounts WHERE blacklist_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM fraudulent_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, reason_for_blacklist FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM blacklist_history WHERE blacklist_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraudulent_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT account_name, account_id FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE reason_for_blacklist = 'Fraudulent Activity';
SELECT account_id, account_name, reason_for_blacklist FROM fraudulent_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklist_history WHERE note IS NOT NULL ORDER BY blacklist_date ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraudulent_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 5, 8);
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_number FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE blacklisted = true;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM fraudulent_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts
SELECT account_id, account_number FROM fraudulent_accounts ORDER BY account_number DESC
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE blacklisted = TRUE
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT account_id, reason FROM flagged_transactions JOIN blacklist_logs ON flagged_transactions.account_id = blacklist_logs.account_id
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts;
SELECT account_number, account_holder FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fraud_patterns WHERE description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM fraud_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT account_number, report_date FROM fraud_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE account_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT account_number, fraud_reason FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE id > 100 AND fraud_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT account_holder, fraud_reason, account_number FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE account_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_details LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT account_number, report_date FROM fraud_reports JOIN fraudulent_accounts ON fraud_reports.account_number = fraudulent_accounts.account_number ORDER BY report_date ASC;
